GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
misc: tifm: fix possible memory leak in tifm_7xx1_switch_media()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 2bbb222a54ff501f77ce593d21b76b79c905045e, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 2428a8fe2261e901e058d9ea8b6ed7e1b4268b79. For more details please see the references link.
